name: Socaverse
description: SOCA is the bridge between soccer lovers and crypto users. SOCA will collaborate with celebrities, designers, and influencers to drop limited and exclusive merchandise in the future. There will also be more games and crypto-related features that engage our users and token holders. We are building a full-stack Metaverse company that enables players to enter our ecosystem and be rewarded from their NFTs with play-to-earn games.
